title._content: [Herbert Livingston Satterlee house, Great Head, Bar Harbor, Maine. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. [Herbert Livingston Satterlee house, Great Head, Bar Harbor, Maine. Flower borders to cove] [1924] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. Camp with multiple buildings from 1911. Landscape: Beatrix Jones Farrand, designed 1921. Associated Name: Louisa Morgan (Mrs. Herbert L.) Satterlee. Other: Louise Morgan Satterlee was the daughter of John Pierpont Morgan. Today: Camp and garden not extant. On slide (handwritten): "Satterlee, Bar Harbor." Includes corner of camera cloth at top left? Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16690 Call Number: LC-J717-X107- 46
